channel.title: Help with Alpakit Error
channel.description:
Hi, if someone know why i have this error when i'm trying to use alpakit, or what does this error mean ? (I'm new with Unreal Engine).
I installed UE from jenkins-UE-4.25.3-CSS-40 on GitHub
![image|690x57, 100%](upload://Aq7ViEuIhjWcnAxznusduCiVPax.png) The complete error line is:
UATHelper: Package Mod Task (Windows): ERROR: Failed to load script DLL: D:\Dev\SML\Build\Alpakit.Automation\Scripts\Alpakit.Automation.dll: Impossible de charger le fichier ou l'assembly 'Alpakit.Automation, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null' ou une de ses dépendances. L'opération n'est pas prise en charge. (Exception de HRESULT : 0x8013 1515)
*Sorry if part of this output is in French, I think it's because my Windows is too*

item.title: Help with Alpakit Error
item.dc:creator: @Watz WatzTheEngineer
item.description:
@Watz wrote:

I finaly found a solution here
Windows blocked automatically Alpakit.Automation.dll

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Alpakit Error
item.dc:creator: @Watz WatzTheEngineer
item.description:
@Watz wrote:

Hi, if someone know why i have this error when i’m trying to use alpakit, or what does this error mean ? (I’m new with Unreal Engine).

1515)
